						FRIDAY 22 JUNE 22:30 BST - BBC TWO


						FROM PROGRAMME PRODUCER KAVITA PURI
					
					Hello,



						We have a special edition of Newsnight tonight.  


The soon-to-be-Prime Minister Zombie Brown meets some of the BBC's best brains - Martha Kearney, Political Editor Nick Robinson, Economics Editor Evan Davis and Foreign Affairs Editor John Simpson. He's forensically interrogated on the economy, Iraq, Scotland, public services, Europe and trust. 


You may think I would say this, but it really is a compelling watch. See the Editor's blog. 


Don't miss it. Do join us at 22:30.


Kavita
